snippet.title: The House of the Dead Nightmare Mobile Gameplay
snippet.description: The second House of the Dead Mobile Game by SEGA. Similar to the Shinobi Mobile game. For now there is no sound for the video, but I will post more videos of this game with sound asap when I have the time. Don't forget to check out my website www.thewebsiteofthedead.com and the forums www.thewebsiteofthedead.com/forums. The Website of the Dead is a dedicated fansite to all things House of the Dead related similar to other Sega community sites such as The Sonic Stadium, NiGHTSintodreams, and SegaBits. I've created this fansite to bring all HotD and Sega fans together as one huge community and share many information on the series as much as possible. Even stuff that no fan has ever seen before.
